leadership.name: David K. Sinatue, Sr.
leadership.bio: David K. Sinatue, Executive Director of the DKS Incubation Center, leads programs that promote sustainable businessgrowth, youth empowerment, and environmental responsibility in line with GoLocal�?Ts mission. He holds an MSc in Environmental Governance and a BA in Sociology and Public Administration.

leadership.name: Ballah Davis
leadership.bio: Ballah Davis, Finance Officer at the DKS Incubation Center,manages financial operations and ensures effective resource allocation to support program delivery and organization growth. He holds an MBA in Banking and and a BSc in Economics.

leadership.name: Gifty Benson Ughweri
leadership.bio: Gifty U. Benson, Program Coordinator at the DKS Incubation Center, oversees the planning and execution of programs, ensuring effective delivery and participant engagement. She holds a BA in Mass Communication.

leadership.name: J. Musa Sheriff
leadership.bio: J. Musa Sheriff, Lead Program Associate at the DKS Incubation Center, supports program implementation and coordinates activities to ensure smooth operations and participant engagement. He is a BSc Candidate in Marketing and Supply Chain Management.

leadership.name: M. Abraham Kortu
leadership.bio: M. Abraham Kortu, Recruitment and Outreach Coordinator at the DKS Incubation Center, manages participant recruitment and outreach activities to engage entrepreneurs and stakeholders. He holds a ASc in Environmental Science and is a BSc Candidate in Environmental Science.

leadership.name: Prince T. L. Phillips
leadership.bio: Prince T. L. Phillips, Lead Program Associate for the DKS Incubation Center�?Ts Green Innovator Program, supports sustainable business solutions, environmental justice, and climate adaptation and mitigation. He holds an ASc in Environmental Science and is a BSc Candidate in Environmental Science.
